rules.name: brutesDropBannerPatterns
rules.description: A piglin brute killed by a blaze may drop a piglin banner pattern
extras: There is a 1 in 12 chance of this happening

rules.name: brutesDropPigstepDiscs
rules.description: A piglin brute killed by a wither skeleton may drop a pigstep disc
extras: There is a 1 in 8 chance of this happening

rules.name: cobwebWeaving
rules.description: Cave spiders walking through string weave cobwebs

rules.name: dispensersMakeOres
rules.description: Dispensing a resource into stone/deepslate/netherrack/blackstone makes the ore/gilded blackstone
extras: This has a 7 in 10 chance of working, and a 3 in 10 chance of just spitting out the resource

rules.name: dragonEggHatching
rules.description: Right clicking a dragon egg that is on top of magma has a change of 'hatching' it
extras: This removes the block and gives you a dragon head

rules.name: dripleafCrushing
rules.description: Iron golems standong on big dripleaves 'crushes' them down to small dripleaves

rules.name: husksDropRedSand
rules.description: When hit, husks may drop red sand items
extras: It is always 1 item each hit, damage dealt doesn't matter

rules.name: husksShedSand
rules.description: While walking, husks shed sand items
extras: They must be moving on their own, not being pushed

rules.name: renewableCalcite
extras: Because in real life, calcite forms in calcium rich water

rules.name: renewableTuff
rules.description: Right clicking magma with blaze powder may form tuff
extras: Because in real life, tuff forms in volcanic eruptions
